text: 5.12: 2 Sto 36.16 naŋga, Lu 6.23 naŋga, Sɨ 5.41 naŋga, 7.52 naŋga, 1 Te 2.15 naŋga, Hi 11.32-38 naŋga, Je 5.10 naŋga, 1 Pi 4.13Kandɨhamata musa andɨtu ndahara aru kɨnzɨhɨnzɨtɨmara. Muhɨmɨmuhɨm avihɨmɨŋgɨm narɨŋambirɨm Gotɨndu pɨhuyɨ kɨyɨ. Kru Gotɨndu kuyu mɨŋata ambavaravara Gotɨndu haŋɨnɨŋ kasiramata umu haŋɨnɨŋɨrɨm ndahara sɨhwɨmaña musa nda andɨmu, vami.
